{"type":"text","timestamp":1771655769269,"sessionID":"ses_38116fdbfffeqyp6wLShcO9BaJ","part":{"id":"prt_c7ee9951f001qeSEJosV378sfa","sessionID":"ses_38116fdbfffeqyp6wLShcO9BaJ","messageID":"msg_c7ee9027e001LlNrWnHkULioHK","type":"text","text":"```dockerfile
FROM python:3.11-slim

# Set working directory
WORKDIR /app

# Install system dependencies (opencv needs them)
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends \
    libgl1-mesa-glx \
    libglib2.0-0 \
    && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

# Copy requirements first for better caching
COPY requirements.txt .

# Install Python dependencies
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir -r requirements.txt

# Copy application code
COPY . .

# Download model during build (cached separately)
RUN python download_model.py

# Expose port
EXPOSE 8000

# Health check
HEALTHCHECK --interval=30s --timeout=3s --start-period=5s --retries=3 \
    CMD curl -f http://localhost:8000/health || exit 1

# Run the application
CMD ["uvicorn", "main:app", "--host", "0.0.0.0", "--port", "8000"]
```

---

**Layer breakdown for build cache:**

1. `FROM python:3.11-slim` → image pull
2. `WORKDIR /app` → layer
3. `RUN apt-get...` → system deps
4. `COPY requirements.txt .` → code copy (layer)
5. `RUN pip install...` → pip install (layer, cached)
6. `COPY . .` → app code copy (layer, NOT cached)
7. `RUN python download_model.py` → model download (layer, NOT cached)
8. `EXPOSE` → layer
9. `HEALTHCHECK` → layer
10. `CMD` → layer

Changing app code only triggers layer 6 (pip install skipped). Changing requirements or model only triggers layers 4-5 or 7.","time":{"start":1771655769268,"end":1771655769268}}}
